page.title: 14THATCHAM INDUSTRY, 2.
page.content: Thatcham industries also include Allmilmo who employ 22 people, own 1,100 square feet and distribute German kitchens, Kennet Packaging Ltd. who make packaging, own 1,100 square feet where 11 people are employed, Cab Parts and Accessories Ltd. employ 5 people, own quarter of an acre of land and make tractor parts. Deans make window blinds, 8 people are employed and 275 square feet of land is used. The Royal Army Ordnance Depot occupies 258,998 square feet. It was at its peak around 1944 when there were 7000 people working there. Today there are 300 people employed. Near Midgham is Old Acre Engineering who own 5 acres, employ 5 people and make tools.
